name: Learn with Talking Translator
description: Includes offline dictionary  Many languages - Spanish, Chinese, German, French, Korean, Russian and so on! Talking Translator / Dictionary - Word of the day - (also in widget; and daily notifications - turn them off in Settings) - Supports many languages - Italian, French, German, Chinese, Japanese, etc. - Includes offline dictionary - Sentence correction - Transcription / transliteration for many languages - Speech recognition  Speak a sentence in most common languages and hear the translation! Note: The app offers a very large number of languages for translation. Not all languages have voice support.  * Please note that we do not have any control over payments and downloads. So please do not contact us regarding payment or download issues. We are always happy to help with the app features!  - voice / speech recognition for all major languages - eMail or SMS the translation - copy to paste in other apps - translation history   Available on iPhone too - https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/talking-translator!/id579870510?mt=8
